segmentosSRT.text: Was it from some dead officer?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Besides, we're from the same town.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: The Reds must be on the attack.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: You want to go home, don't run.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
The Reds treat POWs well.
I've been one before.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
- I heard you got back this morning.
- I'm back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: I have come to see if you need anything.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: He has served in the Liberation Army?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Come along and get an education.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
Because of the family home,
he's been sentenced a landlord.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: He refused, beat up a cadre...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
That wasn't ours.
It was counterrevolutionary timber.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Of course. You're you, he's him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: To deliver water to the steelworks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
We're racing towards Communism,
and you worry about food?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: We are setting up communal kitchens.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: We are less politically aware than your son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
We are just two bullets short
of liberating Taiwan.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
All I've seen at the worksites
are student marching bands.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: We'll spur them on with puppet shows.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: How do you like my singing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
- You're eating?
- Come on in, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't let me interrupt.
- We're finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: You have to get rid of those puppets.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng has asked me many times...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: to get you a better job. What do you think?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: I may have found a prospect for Fengxia.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Let's not let her in on it for now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi sent word from the hospital.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Another working class member on the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: I'm no longer head of the township.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: I have to confess my crimes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: I have faith in the Party.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: I've always followed Chairman Mao's path.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09

segmentosSRT.text: Niu, don't let it get to you. Take care!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_09
